name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with expertise in **PHP**, **WordPress**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **PHPUnit**. Skilled at implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and leveraging **Amazon Web Services** for optimized cloud solutions. Proven track record of designing scalable and reliable applications while enhancing user experience across diverse sectors. Adept at delivering complex solutions with a focus on clean, efficient code and robust architecture, contributing to significant performance improvements.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained high-performance WordPress sites utilizing **PHP** and **JavaScript**, achieving a 30% reduction in page load times.
Implemented automated testing with **PHPUnit**, increasing code reliability by 25% through enhanced test coverage.
Created custom themes and plugins, leveraging **TypeScript** to improve front-end functionality while reducing code duplication by 20%.
Designed user-friendly interfaces using **React**, improving user engagement metrics by 40%.
Established CI/CD pipelines with **Amazon Web Services (AWS)**, increasing deployment frequency by 50% and significantly reducing rollback incidents.
Optimized website performance and security by integrating performance monitoring solutions with AWS services, maintaining a site availability of 99.9%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver solutions aligned with project goals, resulting in a client satisfaction score of 95%.

Leveraged **PHP** and **JavaScript** to develop and maintain high-quality WordPress solutions, enhancing website performance and user experience.
Implemented **CI/CD** practices using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, achieving a 30% reduction in deployment times.
Utilized **React** and **TypeScript** for creating dynamic user interfaces, improving client satisfaction scores by 15%.
Conducted automated testing using **PHPUnit**, increasing code reliability and reducing bugs by 40%.
Migrated legacy systems to **WordPress**, streamlining content management processes for over **200** clients, and reducing maintenance costs by **20%**.

• Developed robust backend solutions utilizing **PHP** and **WordPress**, enabling seamless website functionality and integration.
• Enhanced site performance and user experience through **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, achieving a **40%** improvement in load time.
• Created and maintained CI/CD pipelines, increasing deployment efficiency by **50%**.
• Implemented frontend features with **React**, optimizing component performance and responsiveness, leading to an average loading time reduction of **30%**.
• Utilized **PHPUnit** for testing, ensuring high code quality and a decrease in bugs by **30%**.
• Leveraged **Amazon Web Services (AWS)** for cloud hosting, improving site reliability and reducing downtime by achieving a **98%** uptime.
